item.description:
The Life of Mary Magdalene
Father Peter Bowes
Saturday, June 20 â€¢ 10 a.m. to 2 p.m.

Much controversy has surrounded the great converted heart of Mary Magdalene, but few have understood the enormous courage, love, and tenacity that moved her from a life of a sinner to a life of purity, honesty, and love. Come, learn of the real Mary Magdalene, of her conversion story, and be inspired by the one who allowed the love of the Master Jesus to change her forever.

Suggested Donation: $30 (lunch included)

http://sites.google.c....
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: The Life of Mary Magdalene
